title: Zoot Women's Laguna Running Shoe
features: Running shoe with breathable mesh and synthetic upper featuring sock-like BareFit construction
description: Lightweight with the right touch of support, welcome the laguna to the zoot family! Step into the guidance shoe with a breathable mesh upper combining seamless 3d printing, barefit internal lining for a sock like feel and internal reinforcement for a great fit and support without adding weight. The midsole combines interlocking parts of z-bound+ and zva as well as an internal medial support to gently guide you to smooth long lasting cushion. With minimal carbon rubber pods, added traction in the heel and toe, your body will feel comfortable and natural in every stride. 8mm drop. 8.2 oz.

Founded in Kona, Hawaii, the home of the Ironman Triathlon World Championships, Zoot Sports has been committed to multi-sport athletes and their sports since 1983. Today, Zoot Sports is the market leader in Triathlon Race Day Apparel and has grown to be a premier endurance multisports brand, focused on multi-sports and multi-season apparel, wetsuits and accessories to outfit athletes in each discipline of the sport; Swim, Bike and Run. The Zoot Sports philosophy is to provide the highest level of performance, innovation, quality and fit without sacrificing design and aesthetics. Zoot Sports believes that the athlete that is the most comfortable, supported and ventilated will be the athlete that performs best, race day and everyday.
